dcterms:description: A widely used publicly available dataset for medical report generation tasks containing 3,955 fully de-identified radiology reports with sections such as Impression, Findings, Indication, etc., each associated with frontal and/or lateral chest X-rays, totaling 7,470 images.
dcterms:title: IU X-Ray

dcterms:creator: Z. Wang
H. Han
L. Wang
X. Li
L. Zhou
dcterms:description: A dataset containing synthetic radiology images, clinical photos, portraits, compound radiology images, and digital art, with roughly 65,460 and 8,182 'radiology', and 4,902 and 613 'out-of-class' images in the train and test set respectively.
dcterms:title: ROCO
